an10.45:4.1: * “Dasayime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā rājantepurappavesane.
an10.45:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, rājā mahesiyā saddhiṃ nisinno hoti.
an10.45:4.5: Mahesī vā bhikkhuṃ disvā sitaṃ pātukaroti, bhikkhu vā mahesiṃ disvā sitaṃ pātukaroti.
an10.45:4.8: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo ādīnavo rājantepurappavesane. (1)
an10.45:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, rājā bahukicco bahukaraṇīyo aññataraṃ itthiṃ gantvā na sarati:
an10.45:5.4: ‘na kho idha añño koci pavisati, aññatra pabbajitena.
an10.45:5.6: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo ādīnavo rājantepurappavesane. (2)
an10.45:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, rañño antepure aññataraṃ ratanaṃ nassati.
an10.45:6.3: ‘na kho idha añño koci pavisati, aññatra pabbajitena.
an10.45:6.5: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo ādīnavo rājantepurappavesane. (3)
an10.45:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, rañño antepure abbhantarā guyhamantā bahiddhā sambhedaṃ gacchanti.
an10.45:7.3: ‘na kho idha añño koci pavisati, aññatra pabbajitena.
an10.45:7.5: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho ādīnavo rājantepurappavesane. (4)
an10.45:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, rañño antepure pitā vā puttaṃ pattheti putto vā pitaraṃ pattheti.
an10.45:8.3: ‘na kho idha añño koci pavisati, aññatra pabbajitena.
an10.45:8.5: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamo ādīnavo rājantepurappavesane. (5)
an10.45:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, rājā nīcaṭṭhāniyaṃ ucce ṭhāne ṭhapeti.
an10.45:9.2: Yesaṃ taṃ amanāpaṃ tesaṃ evaṃ hoti:
an10.45:9.5: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, chaṭṭho ādīnavo rājantepurappavesane. (6)
an10.45:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, rājā uccaṭṭhāniyaṃ nīce ṭhāne ṭhapeti.
an10.45:10.2: Yesaṃ taṃ amanāpaṃ tesaṃ evaṃ hoti:
an10.45:10.5: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, sattamo ādīnavo rājantepurappavesane. (7)
an10.45:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, rājā akāle senaṃ uyyojeti.
an10.45:11.2: Yesaṃ taṃ amanāpaṃ tesaṃ evaṃ hoti:
an10.45:11.5: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, aṭṭhamo ādīnavo rājantepurappavesane. (8)
an10.45:12.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, rājā kāle senaṃ uyyojetvā antarāmaggato nivattāpeti.
an10.45:12.2: Yesaṃ taṃ amanāpaṃ tesaṃ evaṃ hoti:
an10.45:12.5: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, navamo ādīnavo rājantepurappavesane. (9)
an10.45:13.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, rañño antepuraṃ hatthisammaddaṃ assasammaddaṃ rathasammaddaṃ rajanīyāni rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbāni, yāni na pabbajitassa sāruppāni.
an10.45:13.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa ādīnavā rājantepurappavesane”ti. (10)
